Value: Rewardle Holdings Limited, together with its subsidiaries, provides digital customer engagement platform for SME merchants. The company provides Rewardle platform, a marketing and transactional platform that combines membership, points, rewards, mobile ordering, payments, and social media integration into a single cloud based platform powered by big data analysis. It has a strategic partnership with Pepper Leaf and Beanhunter. The company was incorporated in 2014 and is headquartered in Melbourne, Australia.
